comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Edward Thomas Devine (1867-1948) – Economist, Child Welfare Advocate, Educator, Author and Pioneer Social Worker (www.socialwelfarehistory.com/people/devine-edward-t-3/) See article in The Washington herald., February 14, 1916, Page 3, col. 1 "MONDAY EVENING CLUB TO DINE DR. E. T. DEVINE - Columbia Professor, Well Known Here as Social Worker, Soon to Leave for Russia".

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59: Thanks for the additional information and correct spelling of Mr. Devine. We will correct and expand the record.
